div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _DedicatedClinicalLocationRoleType

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
_DedicatedClinicalLocationRoleTypeDedicatedClinicalLocationRoleTypeA role of a place that further classifies the clinical setting (e.g., cardiology clinic, primary care clinic, rehabilitation hospital, skilled nursing facility) in which care is delivered during an encounter.

description.value: A role of a place that further classifies the clinical setting (e.g., cardiology clinic, primary care clinic, rehabilitation hospital, skilled nursing facility) in which care is delivered during an encounter.
